description.narrative: This project support UNDP’s global “Climate Promise” to ensure that Iraq submits enhanced Nationally Determined Contributions(NDC) in 2020. The Climate Promise resources to support review and validation of this draft National Determined Contribution.

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: 1.1 # of Policy makers sensitized on the Nationally Determined Contributions (NDC) process and implementation 1.2 # of women at ladership levels at national and provincial levels sensitized on the NDC for its implementation 1.3 # of staff of the Ministry of Health and Environment trained to lead the NDC process in Iraq 1.4 Number of awareness workshops 2.1 Number of measurement, reporting and verification (MRV) systems designed at the National and sectoral levels 2.2 Number of tools developed 2.3 Number of protected areas suggested to GEF (by PPG) 3.1 Number of workshops completed to prepare and validate the implementation plan for the NDC 3.2 Number of progress reviews completed 3.3 Participation and position statement developed 3.4 Number of MoEn personnel capacitated (Policy makers and technical delegation) 3.5 Number of mainstreaming campaigns 3.6 Number of delegates members supported to participate in COP26 3.7 Number of site assessments developed on (Important Birds Area) and KBA (Key biodiversity Area) in Baghdad City 3.8 Number of Biodiversity Guide for the potential IBA and KBA guides developed 3.9 Number of protected areas (oases) established in the country- Anbar as part of the efforts of Ministry of Environment to support establishing the development of protected areas. 3.10 National Roadmap for Implementation of the NDC developed 3.11 National Biodiversity report updated

comment.narrative: 1.1 In 2015, the Government of Iraq submitted the INDC to the UNFCCC. The NDC is under development .100 policy makers were sensitized on the NDC process in 2021 1.2.Women leadership is negligible/limited in NDC implementation. .10 Women were partially engaged in leading the development process of the NDC on national level and on provincial level in KRG in 2021 1.3.The existing capacity for preparation and implementation of the NDC within the Ministry of Health and Environment is limited. 10 staff from the Climate Change Center under MoHEn were capacitated on leading the development and preparation process of the NDC in 2021 1.4 Zero climate change systematic awareness campaign 2.1 Inadequate MRV system exist 2.2 Limited Gender equality tools, indicators and data systems exist 2.3 Zero suggested areas 3.1 Zero workshops conducted to prepare and validate the implementation plan for the NDC 3.2 Four periodic progress reviews held in 2020 3.3 Zero participation guides and position statement 3.4 Zero workshops conducted to train policy makers and technical delegation 3.5 Zero mainstreaming 3.6 No support 3.7 Zero site assessments on IBAs and KBAs (2022) 3.8 Zero Guides (2022) 3.9 Zero protected areas in Anbar (2022) 3.10 Zero National NDC roadmap (2022) 3.11 Outdated National Biodiversity report (2022)

1.1 30 policy makers sensitized on NDC process and implementation 1.2 5 Women leadership strengthened in NDC implementation on national and provincial levels 1.3 10 Ministry of Health and Environment staff trained to lead the NDC process in Iraq. 1.4 5 workshops on Climate change campaign (NAP and NAMA awareness) (2021) 2.1 National and sectoral MRV systems designed and strengthened (zero for 2021) 2.2 Two Gender equality tools for mitigation measures on local and national level developed 2.3 Two protected areas suggested by developing PPG for GEF (2021) 3.1 Workshops completed (zero in 2021) 3.2 Four progress reviews completed of NDC policy development 3.3 One participation guide and position statement developed (2021) 3.4 Two workshops completed to capacitate (40 individuals) on negotiation policy makers and technical delegation (2021) 3.5 One mainstreaming campaign completed (2021) 3.6 Support the participation of 5 of Iraqi delegates to COP26 (2021)

1.1 30 policy makers were sensitized on NDC process and implementation (done) 1.2 5 Women leadership strengthened in NDC implementation on national and provincial levels (done) 1.3 10 Ministry of Health and Environment staff trained to lead the NDC process in Iraq. (done) 1.4 5 workshops on Climate change campaign (NAP and NAMA awareness) (in progress) 2.1 National and sectoral MRV systems designed and strengthened (zero for 2021) (done) 2.2 Two Gender equality tools for mitigation measures on local and national level developed (done) 2.3 Two protected areas suggested by developing PPG for GEF (not started) 3.1 Workshops completed to validate the implementation plan for NDC (done) 3.2 Four progress reviews completed of NDC policy development (done) 3.3 One participation guide and position statement developed (done) 3.4 Two workshops completed to capacitate (40 individuals) on negotiation policy makers and technical delegation (done) 3.5 One mainstreaming campaign completed (done) 3.6 Support the participation of 5 of Iraqi delegates to COP26 (done)

1.1 75 policy makers to be sensitized on NDC process and implementation in 2022 1.2 25 women at leadership levels to be sensitized on NDC implementation on national and provincial levels in 2022 1.3 Zero Ministry of Health and Environment staff trained to lead the NDC. 1.4 conduct 5 workshops as a part climate change systematic awareness campaign 2.1 Zero National and sectoral MRV systems designed and strengthened 2.2 Zero Gender equality tools for mitigation measures on local and national level developed 2.3 Two protected areas suggested 3.1 Workshops completed to validate the implmentation plan for NDC 3.2 Zero progress reviews to be completed in 2022 3.3 Zero participation guide and position statement developed in 2022 3.4 Zero workshops completed to capacitate (40 individuals) on negotiation policy makers and technical delegation in 2022 3.5. Zero mainstreaming campaign completed in 2022 3.6 Zero support the logsitic participation of 4 individuals of the Iraqi delegation to the COP26 in 2022 3.7 One IBA (Important Birds Area) and KBA (Key biodiversity Area) site assessment developped and draft of management plan (2022) 3.8 One Biodiversity guide developed for the potential IBA and KBA in Baghdad City (2022) 3.9 Support establishing a protected area in Anbar governorate (preparation efforts to collect data and establish oasis with focus on land degradation and solar energy in build-up for GEF8) (2022) 3.10 One NDC national roadmap developed (2022) 3.11 Updating the National Biodiversity report (2022)

1.1 30 policy makers sensitized on NDC process and implementation 1.2 At least 10 women at leadership levels sensitized on NDC implementation on national and provincial levels 1.3 20 Ministry of Health and Environment staff trained to lead the NDC process in Iraq. 2.1 At least 2 (1 National and 1 sectoral) MRV systems designed and strengthened 2,2 Two gender equality tools for mitigation measures on local and national level developed 3.1 Two workshops completed 3.2 Four progress reviews completed

1.1 Through the various NDC consultation events, more than 30 policy makers on deputy minister and director general level were sensitized on NDC process and implementation. The NDC document was approved on deputy minister level. 1.2 More than 5 women at leadership level participated in the NDC consultation events for NDC implementation on national and provincial levels 1.3 10 Ministry of Health and Environment staff trained to lead the NDC process in Iraq. 2.1 (1 National and 1 sectoral) MRV systems designed and strengthened 2.2 Development of gender equality tools for mitigation measures on local and national level shifted to 2021 3.1 Two workshop conducted to prepare and validate implementation plan for the NDC with participation from deputy minister level and from the National NDC Committee 3.2- Three progress reviews completed on the NDC development process
Not Applicable- Project duration is between 01/01/2020 to 31/12/2021
Not Applicable- Project duration is between 01/01/2020 to 31/12/2021
